documents.title: that 's a wrap !
text: a quick summary : breaking bad won just about everything and everyone cheered .
so did modern family and everyone grumbled .
british people won a whole bunch of awards too for sherlock and stuff .
barely any of them showed up to get their trophies .
maybe they 're mad that we call it soccer ?
i do n't know .
seth meyers kinda sucked , sofia vergara was turned into a prop , everyone is white and male , and nothing every changes and the emmys is awful .
in other news , the oscars is only six months away .
thanks for joining us and goodnight !
alright everyone , that 's it for the emmys .
enjoy your local news and let 's get together next year when modern family wins 27 more trophies .
you 're going to play off vince gilligan ?
oh hell no !
do n't end the emmy 's like this .
oh wait instead you ended with a lame seth meyers joke .
brought it right back to the beginning there , did n't you ?

documents.title: award : outstanding drama
text: breaking bad .
what a shock !
it 's totally deserved , but not at all a surprise .
is it too late for them to give one of their emmys to the wire ?
brian stelter ( @ brianstelter ) it was so much fun to write this story about `` modern family '' sweeping the emmys in 2010 .
this sums up my entire night .
richard rushfield ( @ richardrushfield ) its adorable when hipster media people get mad at awards shows .

documents.title: award : outstanding comedy
text: that crusty old donut left on the office counter modern family .
seriously ?
yes , they deserve to be played out .
can we all agree that this should be the last time that jay leno ever appears on television ?

documents.title: outstanding actor in a drama series
text: bryan cranston for breaking bad , defeating two movie stars .
that is some serious emmy mojo right there .
good luck next year woody and matthew .
oh wait .
never mind .
anne helen petersen ( @ annehelen ) story of the emmys // `` those guys and one woman ''

documents.title: award : lead actress in a drama series
text: julianna margulies for the good wife .
finally some recognition for the best show on television .
i could write a whole treatise about how alicia florick says volumes with the simplest look .
love that she got a dig in against other dramas by mentioning that her series does 22 episodes a season instead of a paltry eight to 13 .
julianna margulies presents the award for outstanding television movie for the normal heart anzuoni/reuters

documents.title: award : outstanding writing for a drama
text: moira walley-beckett for breaking bad .
she is only the second woman tonight to win in a category without the word ã¤ctress in a it .
they still let katherine heigl go to this thing ?
not everyone was amused by the emmys offering up sophia vergara on a rotating platform in an effort to make their ceo 's speech more interesting .
actress sofia vergara poses on stage during the 66th annual primetime emmy awards held at the nokia theater on august 25 , 2014 .
davis/nbc/nbc via getty images kate spencer ( @ katespencer ) `` work hard , '' i whisper to my daughters .
`` and one day you too could be honored for your talent by being rotated on a platform on live tv . ''
emilynussbaum ( @ emilynussbaum ) on the plus side , the vergara bit has magically united everyone in my twitter feed in mutual sorrow and shame .
krystie lee yandoli ( @ krystielyandoli ) sophia vergara was literally just used as a prop , because women are props .
cool # emmys concepcin lara ( @ lowsell ) again and again hollywood reminds us that latinas are sexy , s and curvy women made for consumption ( see : sophã­a vergara at the # emmys ) .

alex blagg ( @ alexblagg ) beyoncã© 's feminist sign photoshopped behind rotating sophia vergara barbie in 5 4 3 frank sennett ( @ sennettreport ) just had to explain the sexist humor of the sophia vergara bit to my 10-year-old son .
ugh .
kayla epstein ( @ kaylaepstein ) `` this segment is boring , what should we do ? ''
`` let 's just objectify some poor woman for no reason , that usually works '' `` k cool '' # emmys allison lanza ( @ allisonlanza ) aaaand with that sexist sophia vergara bit , my tv is now off .
did n't last long .

documents.title: award : outstanding supporting actress in a drama
text: anna gunn for breaking bad , for the second year in a row .
how many women is bryan cranston going to have to kiss tonight ?
vince gilligan , from left , anna gunn , and bryan cranston at the emmys shearer/invision for the television academy

documents.title: award : best directing in a drama
text: cary joji fukunaga for true detective .
a very deserved award , it was a gorgeous show .
now if only he would explain the flat circle .
it 's 10:23 on a monday and i just had to see debra messing in her spanx .
also this is worth noting in this day of questionable wins , especially in the comedy categories .
mark harris ( @ markharrisnyc ) robin williams was brilliant in the first season of mork & mindy .
he lost the emmy .
alright , billy crystal 's tribute to robin williams was pretty touching , but he 's best known on tv for mork and mindy and not a clip or anything .
odd choice of the clips they showed of him .
linda holmes ( @ nprmonkeysee ) oh my god , they cut out the fact that that bit ends with him saying , in that baby voice , `` fuck it . ''
# emmys
sitting here reminding myself not to make an inappropriate jokes during the in memorial montage .

documents.title: award : outstanding supporting actor in a drama
text: aaron paul for breaking bad , which is not a surprise at all .
i miss him , i love him he said of his character jesse pinkman .
he 's said this before , in an interview with nosheen iqbal on the guardian .
read it here los angeles , ca - august 25 : actor aaron paul in the audience at the 66th annual primetime emmy awards held at nokia theatre l.a. winter/getty images

documents.title: outstanding variety series
text: the colbert report , which gwen stefani just adell nazeemed .
oh , it was all a bit for jimmy fallon .
oh yay , more straight white male late night hosts .
we need that like modern family needs another emmy .
alright , everyone , finish this sentence : the most boring part of the emmys is

documents.title: award : outstanding directing in a variety special
text: glenn weiss for the 67th annual tony awards .
he is also directing the emmys and wearing a headset like madonna .
nbc just plugged the in memorial montage coming up in 16 minutes .
way to cash in on robin williams ' grief .
and then they talked about the ã¿ear of change in late night television.yeah , we swapped out a bunch of straight white guys for more straight white guys .
you wo n't even recognise it .
erin mccann ( @ mccanner ) an electric piano just played 'stayin alive ' while the screen flashed 17 minutes until the in memoriam segment .

documents.title: award : outstanding writing for a variety special
text: sarah silverman for sarah silverman : we are miracles .
the show has an amazing joke that i ca n't even retell here .
that bit about being molecules sounds like she was hitting some of that pot that was in her bag .
buzzfeed celeb ( @ buzzfeedceleb ) sarah silverman and her vape pen
ricky gervais is the only brit not winning an award tonight .

documents.title: award : outstanding television movie
text: the normal heart !
so glad ryan murphy is bringing larry kramer up on stage .
finally the loudmouth is getting some recognition .
i 'm not a big ryan murphy fan , but props for telling the kids out there to get involved with aids causes .

it 's the same as a tv , but it 's curved .
guys , it 's only 9:30 .

documents.title: award : outstanding miniseries
text: fargo !
an excellent decision and a bit of an upset for the new fx show .
and now they all get to stand next to lena headey 's amazing dress .
what an awful waste of national treasure weird al yankovich .

documents.title: award : outstanding lead actress in a miniseries or american horror story : coven
text: jessica lange for american horror story : coven , the once and future supreme .
matt wells ( @ matthewwells ) four out of five of the last emmy winners have been brits .
two out of four did n't show up .
they bring shame upon the queen .
commercial break analysis : it 's a little worrisome that we 're giving all the awards out to british shows .
it means that networks will start looking more towards acquisitions and less toward creating their own content .
if you can just buy something from the bbc and get a ton of awards , why bother making your own show ?
but what 's even more annoying is that sherlock is not a miniseries .

it 's hard enough for the emmys to classify the expanding universe of ways american channels program their shows , now we have to figure out what to do with british formats as well , which totally confound the way americans do television .

documents.title: award : outstanding lead actor in a miniseries
text: benedict cumberbatch for sherlock , another british person who is too good to come to america to accept an award .
are we not giving out visas to emmy winners or something .
woody harrelson and matthew mcconaughey look like they 're wearing the dumb and dumber tuxes .
or , night at the roxbury characters ?
jenna guillaume ( @ jennaguillaume ) oh my god rt @ twitterid : oh my god
awesome things that have happened so far at the emmys : this .
what goes better with these emmys than warm white wine ?

and he 's british .
do they even give these things out to americans anymore ?

documents.title: award : outstanding lead actress in a comedy
text: julia louis-dreyfus for veep .
and now she 's making out wildly with bryan cranston .
we thought their previous banter was reward enough .
also this is a emmy tradition we can really get behind , not only jld winning , but being hilarious about it as well .

commercial break analysis : we all talk about how orange is the new black gets all of these nominations and how louis c.k .
is included in so many categories and how progressive comedy is slowly taking over the awards .
then all of the comedy awards go to cbs three-comedies that are as outdated as polydent commercials or modern family which , like a three-day old cronut , is still sticky sweet but horribly stale .
well , at least louie won for writing .
can we please fast forward to next year when billy eichner and julia louis-dreyfus are nominated for emmys for their comedic work on the emmys .

documents.title: award : outstanding suppoting actor in a comedy
text: ty burrell wins for modern family .
and we said there was no way he would take it .
everyone around the world groaned .
luckily he read a funny speech supposedly written by the kids on modern family .
we even got a shot of the manny cam .
i do n't know if its seth meyers ' voice or the rapid-fire delivery of his monologue but it sounded totally like a weekend update all about tv .
he starts off his monologue with four jokes about the emmys being on a monday night .
what did he run out of jokes about airplane food ?
the one really good joke about how i met your mother .
he ended with a really inside joke about how agents talk , showing he cares more about everyone in the room than us at home .

trends we 're seeing on the red carpet tonight : red dresses , metallics , pregnancy , buns , plunging necklines , thinking debra messing is overrated .
emmys bracket finale announcement !
and now a word from lilah raptopoulos , with the final result of our week long emmys bracket¦ thanks to everyone who voted in our bracket for the year 's best season on television .
after four nail biting rounds , guardian readers narrowed 16 of tv 's most popular comedies and dramas down to the world 's hardest decision : game of thrones or breaking bad ?
the champion , with 55 % of the vote , is ( cue virtual drumroll ) this is a cat drumroll ok ?
breaking bad !
jesse pinkman and walter white are thrilled .
ockenfels/amc here 's hoping the emmys academy agrees with you tonight .

they share on twitter of course !
check them all out here .

live from the red carpet ' akpanudosen/nbc/nbc via getty images actress christina hendricks arrives to the 66th annual primetime emmy awards polk/nbc/nbc via getty images
january jones and giuliana rancic look like a before and after of someone taking the als ice bucket challenge .
right now we 're watching the red carpet on e !

they have the glam cam 360 , a vertigo-inducing camera where we can see all angles of a star 's dress ; the mani cam , where each celeb marches her fingers down a tiny carpet , and now the clutch cam , which surprisingly has nothing to do with cars we can not drive .
this all just means that tv stars on the red carpet are now under more surveillance than anyone traveling through an airport security line .

documents.title: preamble
text: welcome to the guardian 's live blog of the 66th emmy awards , better known as breaking bad 's official victory lap .
well , we 'll have to wait and see who takes home a gold winged woman to add to their mantlepiece but if bryan cranston is n't a shoo-in for the show 's final season , then i do n't know who is .
but bb is n't the only thing we 'll be looking out for .
critical darling orange is the new black is eligible for the first year and already took home one trophy for outstanding guest star in a drama for uzo aduba , best known as crazy eyes .

we 'll all be judging seth meyers ' job as a host , how much applause robin williams gets during the in memoriam segment , and , of course , every single sequin worn by every single person who walks across the stage or the red carpet .

if you want to read up on who brian moylan thinks is sure to lose tonight , we got you covered , and if you need to refresh your memory about who has been nominated for what , you can check out the full list here ( it 's basically all american horror story : coven and true detective ) .
if you 're dying to know how brian moylan feels about these nominations , you can read all about it here , but he 'll be sure to be carrying on about something or other all night in this very space .
of course we do n't want to hog the microphone .

get down in the comments and let us know who you think deserved to win , who is wearing something absolutely atrocious and just how awesome julia louis-dreyfus is ( answer : really , really awesome ) .
